definition: as if gaining the most precious treasure

sentences.english: It′s just like a treasure palace.
sentences.chinese: 這裏幾乎像一個至寶宮殿。

sentences.english: Kitano hidden in captive discovered king unsanitary environment in north division.
sentences.chinese: 北野武藏在俘虜中如獲至寶的發現了王師北。

sentences.english: Li Ping did. He wanted his book back.
sentences.chinese: 弄到這本書，他如獲至寶。

sentences.english: A good wife and health is a man best wealth.
sentences.chinese: 賢妻和健康是男人的至寶。

sentences.english: Look what is best, that best I wish in thee.
sentences.chinese: 看，生命的至寶，我暗祝你盡有。

sentences.english: It is a theory that has always been cherished by the rich.
sentences.chinese: 這樣一種理論當然被富人奉若至寶。

sentences.english: A good wife and health is a man's best wealth.
sentences.chinese: 賢妻和健康是男子的至寶。

sentences.english: He was thrilled, since it was the only hymnal in his church.
sentences.chinese: 姥爺如獲至寶，因爲那是教會里唯一的讚美詩集。

definition: original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
after hard work and numerous revisions (idiom)/the vicissitudes of life
handed down from ancient times/family heirloom
of noble character and unquestionable integrity (idiom)
to make painstaking efforts (idiom); after much trouble/to work hard at sth
